de.lad1337.osxnotifications.desc: Sends Mac OS 10.8 Notification Center notifications. It will appear as "terminal-notifer" in the system settings.
de.lad1337.osxnotifications.name: OSX Mountain Lion Notifications

de.lad1337.traktwatchlist.desc: Add movies from your http://trakt.tv account. Get your apikey at http://trakt.tv/settings/api
de.lad1337.traktwatchlist.name: Trakt Watchlist

de.lad1337.movie.simplemover.desc: his will move all the avi, mkv, iso, mp4 from the path that is given to the path.
de.lad1337.movie.simplemover.name: Movie Mover

de.lad1337.music.mp32itunes.desc: This will execute an apple script that adds all mp3's/m4a's to iTunes of the given download. MAC OSX only!
de.lad1337.music.mp32itunes.name: MP32iTunes

de.lad1337.movies.xbmc.name: XBMC Notifier
de.lad1337.movies.xbmc.desc: XBMC notifier. Sends screen messages and issues a library scan on a "complet" status.

de.lad1337.boxcar.name: Boxcar
de.lad1337.boxcar.desc: Simple Boxcar.io notifier. This uses the official XDM boxcar service and will subscribe you to it when the first message is send.

de.lad1337.boxcar.monitor.name: Boxcar Monitor
de.lad1337.boxcar.monitor.desc: Simple Boxcar.io notifier. This uses the generic Monitor Service. Enable the Monitor Service at http://boxcar.io. NOTE: this will only be available until the official XDM boxcar service is approved!
